data.Name: The Westly Group
data.Tagline: We are focused on investing in the most innovative companies in the energy, transportation and smart building sectors.
data.About:
The Westly Group is a $400M AUM, early-stage venture capital firm located in Menlo Park, California. We focus on the intersection of smart buildings, transportation, and energy. 

We are looking for teams with innovative technologies to solve the world’s most pressing problems. We believe in the power of the passionate entrepreneur—whether sitting in a modern office tower or a dark Silicon Valley garage—to change the world. Our investments tend to be in later stage companies with existing revenue streams and proven technologies.

We pride ourselves on our ability to help our portfolio companies grow and succeed!
